decision_conditions: The submitted details in relation to Condition 5  (window details)  of planning permission ref 24/01150/HOU are considered to be insufficient  to ensure a satisfactory appearance of the development, contrary to Policy DM10   (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions)  and DM12 (Development in Conservation Areas and Affecting Heritage Assets) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.Officers also raise concern that the  details provided for the proposed  windows and doors are different to those approved under24/01150/HOU . Such  detail changes  cannot be addressed  via a discharge of condition application. The original planning permission would need to be formally varied  in  order to make such changes.
